title: Sight Words: Level 2
description: Learn more important sight words to boost your reading!
subject: sight-words
objectives: Read faster with more sight words

activities.instructions: Let's learn more sight words! These words are everywhere.
activities.content:
More sight words to learn:
You, me, my, see, look
They help us read!

activities.spokenInstructions: Practice these words. You, me, my.

activities.instructions: Great! Here are more sight words.
activities.spokenInstructions: Practice these words. See, look, can.

activities.instructions: You're doing awesome! Learn these too.
activities.spokenInstructions: Practice these words. Like, have, are.

activities.question: I ___ a cat. (to own/possess)
activities.explanation: I HAVE a cat means you own a cat!

activities.question: I ___ pizza! (to enjoy)
activities.explanation: I LIKE pizza means you enjoy eating pizza!
